page.title: 15INFORMATION, POPULATION
page.content: {IMORMATION SERVICE }80% of house have telephones very few have computers which use telephones as a source of imformation. The church publish a magazine news sheet each month Local council provide information of services for health, police etc. School publish a brochure annually and introduction booklet is given out to all new entrant parents. Notices appear on notice boards and shop windows.{POLITICS}There is no party domination on the local council. {POPULATION}of North Leverton is a Cross section of the young to retired, including professionals, people in industry, schools, medical, craftsmen for power stations, farms workers nurses of all grades and some unemployed.
